mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts ( emp_id, title, content, views, created_at, board_id ) VALUES ( #{empId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{views}, #{createdAt}, #{boardId} )
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.title, p.emp_id AS empId, e.name AS author, p.views, p.board_id AS boardId, p.created_at AS createdAt FROM posts p LEFT JOIN employees e ON p.emp_id = e.id ORDER BY p.id DESC

SELECT p.id, p.title, p.content, p.emp_id AS empId, e.name AS author, p.created_at AS createdAt, p.views, p.board_id AS boardId, b.name AS boardName FROM posts p LEFT JOIN employees e ON p.emp_id = e.id LEFT JOIN boards b ON p.board_id = b.id WHERE p.id = #{id}

SELECT p.id, p.emp_id as empId, p.title, p.content, p.views, p.created_at as createdAt, p.board_id as boardId, b.name as boardName, e.name as author FROM posts p JOIN boards b ON p.board_id = b.id JOIN employees e ON p.emp_id = e.id WHERE p.board_id = #{boardId} ORDER BY p.created_at DESC

SELECT p.*, b.name as boardName, e.name as author FROM posts p JOIN boards b ON p.board_id = b.id JOIN employees e ON p.emp_id = e.id WHERE (b.is_global = 1 OR p.board_id IN (SELECT board_id FROM board_permissions WHERE emp_id = #{empId})) AND b.is_active = 1 ORDER BY p.created_at DESC

SELECT posts.id, posts.emp_id AS empId, posts.title, posts.content, posts.views, posts.created_at AS createdAt, posts.board_id AS boardId, boards.name AS boardName FROM posts JOIN boards ON posts.board_id = boards.id WHERE posts.emp_id = #{empId} ORDER BY posts.created_at DESC
